snippet: Supporters of abortion rights called the law, banning most abortions at the 12th week of pregnancy, a “violation of over 40 years of settled United States Supreme Court precedent.”
abstract: Supporters of abortion rights file challenge to Arkansas law banning most abortions after 12th week of pregnancy.
lead_paragraph: Supporters of abortion rights called the law, banning most abortions at the 12th week of pregnancy, a “violation of over 40 years of settled United States Supreme Court precedent.”

headline.seo: Suit Seeks to Block Arkansas Abortion Law
headline.main: Suit Seeks to Block Arkansas Abortion Law
headline.print_headline: Arkansas: Challenge to New Law Curbing Abortion
